info.name: Dark Rap Genius (Old Color Scheme)
info.description: Changes the new website to use the original color scheme.
info.additionalInfo:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://gitlab.com/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

Version 1.9

Minor fixes, search box, titles, annotation links, icons, quiz, apple music player bar.

Version 1.8

Fixed Apple Music player bar, white background on albums/YouTube. Fixed user preview, track numbers, and track titles.

Version 1.7

Fixed icons, some minor text color, search bar, and some elements becoming white on hover.

Version 1.68

Fixed video borders.

Version 1.67

Fixed media controls when scrolling down.

Version 1.66

Fixed create annotation button.

Version 1.65

Fixed song list when viewing bands. Also fixed search results being unreadable. Fixed some black text on song titles.

Version 1.6

Many minor fixes. Icons should now be the proper color, no more white backgrounds, fixed dropdown boxes.

Version 1.55

Fixed green referent color.

Version 1.54

Fixed sidebar.

Version 1.53

Added an option to change the lyric highlight color.

Version 1.52

Fixed dialog box for adding artist, song, and lyric information.

Version 1.51

Fixed artist and album link in the lower right corner. Also fixed popup cards.

Version 1.5

Fixed a white box sitting behind the album art. Also darkened the play button.

Version 1.4

Fixed white backgrounds.

Version 1.3

Fixed track list.

Version 1.2

Fixed font size (it's now identical to the old font) and updated the yellow highlight color.

Version 1.1

Minor fix to to artist added lyric meanings.

Version 1

Initial Version.
